articles.title: Mapping emotions in the body: Study reveals physical topography of feeling - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: The study published in PNAS reveals that emotions create identifiable maps of bodily sensations, consistent across different cultures and races. Using a novel method named "embody," researchers found that subjective emotional experiences are linked to specifi…
